name: 20S Refreshment
description:
In this game, you are a newly joined employee in a very famous Juice shop that is known to deliver some tasty juice in a very fast time. as the player, your job is to keep the reputation of the shop as famous as it is.it is an infinite game so there is no stop to it unless you lose.

Controls:

+ Point and click inside the kitchen to go around the place.

+ Go Near A Mug to pick it up.

+ Take the mug to the color-coordinated juice machine.

+ fill whatever juice the customer wants.

+ after successfully completing and customer's order you have to wash the mug using the washer that is located next to the mug tray to reuse the mug.

+ If The timer over the customer's head runs out you will lose a chance.

+ if you keep losing chances and lose 3 chances the game will be over.

The project's entire source code is available at this link: Peburu01/TCS-GameJam: Just a dud repo for tcs till i upload something (github.com)
